name: St. John of Avila

locations.description: Spanish priest, mystic, and Doctor of the Church, known as the 'Apostle of Andalusia'

summary: John of Avila was a Spanish priest, mystic, and Doctor of the Church known as the 'Apostle of Andalusia'. He was a renowned preacher and spiritual director who influenced many saints including Teresa of Avila and John of the Cross. His spiritual writings, particularly 'Audi, filia' (Listen, Daughter), are considered classics of Spanish mysticism.
